Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hey! How i can change password ?

Hey there! To change your password, you'll need to go to the account settings in your NewsBreak app or website. Look for the 'Change Password' option and follow the prompts to update it. If you need more detailed instructions, feel free to ask!
i cant find this option at website

If you're having trouble finding the 'Change Password' option on the website, it might be located under your profile settings or account settings. Try clicking on your profile icon or name at the top right corner of the page, and look for an option related to account or security settings. If it's still not visible, please let me know, and I can guide you further!
i dont see any profile settings or account settings

It seems like you might need to log in first to access your account settings. You can follow the instructions in this article to create an account or log in: [How to create an account or log in](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/4417483895821-How-to-create-an-account-or-log-in). Once logged in, you should be able to find the settings option. Let me know if you need more help!

Thanks for letting me know you're logged in. If you still can't find the option to change your password, it might be helpful to check if there are any updates or changes in the layout of the website. Sometimes, options can be hidden under different menus or sections. If you're using a mobile device, try accessing the settings through the app instead. If none of these work, please reach out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
